summary: This is an email chain from August 19, 2019, discussing the sharing of photographs of an Epstein co-conspirator. The communication involves a detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force, indicating an active investigative effort to share evidence.

persons.context: The recipient and likely sender of an email regarding sharing photographs of an Epstein co-conspirator.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 19, 2019, concerning photographs of an Epstein co-conspirator.
The communication involves a detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force, indicating inter-agency cooperation.
The subject line 'Epstein Co-conspirator pics' suggests the existence and sharing of photographic evidence related to an associate of Jeffrey Epstein.
